speaker: Moe Steller
title: MLOps (v2) - Unifying MLOps at Microsoft
description:
Moritz Steller and Setu Chokshi stop by to talk about MLOps (v2) Fundamentals, MLOps (v2) Approach, Architectures, MLOps (v2) and they'll demo each new feature! Be sure to tune in!
